column3: 2015. local florists funeral services for lawrence fulton wise
column5: of zavalla will be held tuesday
column7: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. in the carroway funeral home chapel in huntington with brother joel hitchcock officiating. interment will follow in the concord cemetery.	mr. wise was born march 21
column8: 1933 in the norwood community of san augustine county
column9: texas to the late herman and emily (sowell) wise
column12: 2015 zavalla.	mr. wise had resided in zavalla and the east texas area most of his life. he was a member of the carpenters union and at one time owned his own construction company. he was also a beekeeper. mr. wise attended solid rock missionary baptist church. survivors include his daughter and son-in-law
column13: rene and mike gladden of groves; son
column14: lawrence jason wise of zavalla; granddaughters and husbands
column15: kelly and larry washburn of athens
column16: kristy and heath gage of georgetown
column17: and kacy gladden of groves; grandsons
column19: new york and trent gladden of groves; great-grandchildren
column23: and kallyn gage of georgetown; sisters
column24: margie stringer of huntington and verdie barnes of zavalla; and a number of nieces
column25: nephews and other relatives.	he was preceded in death by his parents; wife
column29: and jackie wise.	pallbearers will be john smith
column34: and alton jones.	the family will welcome friends and loved ones from 6:00 to 8:00 p. m. monday evening at the funeral home in huntington.	memories and condolences may be added at www. carrowayfuneralhome. com.	carroway funeral home
